metadata.dc:author: Franco de Castro, A
Truhán, D
Alcover García, J
Carretero González, P
metadata.dc:description: Scrotum's sebaceous cyst is an usual pathology, not life threatening, but susceptible of infection, producing abscess with their associated cosmetic and psychological disturbance. The classical management is the complete excision, under local anaesthesia, to prevent its recidive. Until today, the use of de Nd-YAG laser for the management of the scrotum's sebaceous cysts as not been reported. We report a case of a young man with several scrotum's sebaceous cysts, treated successfully with the use of a Nd-YAG laser.
metadata.dc:title: Fotocoagulación con láser de Nd-YAG de quistes sebáceos escrotales.
[Nd-YAG laser photocoagulation of scrotal sebaceous cysts].
